mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.username, u.`password`, u.salt, u.email, u.mobile, u.`status`, u.create_time, u.create_name, u.update_time, u.update_name FROM sys_user u WHERE u.username=#{username}
SELECT m.* FROM sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON ur.roleId=rm.roleId LEFT JOIN sys_menu m ON rm.menuId=m.id WHERE ur.userId=#{userId} AND m.type = 1

SELECT * FROM sys_user WHERE 1=1
AND status=#{status}
